snippet: Cullen Roche on the Pragmatic Capitalism blog points to a chart by Bank of America Merrill Lynch research that shows the combined market value of Australian banks is now larger than that of banks in the euro zone.
abstract: Cullen Roche on the Pragmatic Capitalism blog points to a chart by Bank of America Merrill Lynch research that shows the combined market value of Australian banks is now larger than that of banks in the euro zone.

headline.main: In Banking, Down Under Is on Top
